sqlMap.select: SELECT IMG_NUM /*이미지 번호*/ , LINK_NUM /*연계 번호*/ , IMG_SN /*이미지 순번*/ , SAVE_PATH /*저장 경로*/ , REAL_FILE_NM /*실제 파일 명*/ , SAVE_FILE_NM /*저장 파일 명*/ FROM TB_CM_IMG WHERE 1=1 AND IMG_NUM = #imgNum# AND LINK_NUM = #linkNum#
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(IMG_NUM)),0) + 1) AS IMG_NUM FROM TB_CM_IMG WHERE LINK_NUM = #linkNum#

SELECT IMG_NUM /*이미지 번호*/ , LINK_NUM /*연계 번호*/ , IMG_SN /*이미지 순번*/ , SAVE_PATH /*저장 경로*/ , REAL_FILE_NM /*실제 파일 명*/ , SAVE_FILE_NM /*저장 파일 명*/ FROM TB_CM_IMG WHERE LINK_NUM = #linkNum# ORDER BY IMG_SN

SELECT DOC_ID , FILE_NUM , SAVE_PATH , SAVE_FILE_NM , REAL_FILE_NM , DOC_DIV , DOC_NM , REG_DTTM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , DOC_ID , FILE_NUM , SAVE_PATH , SAVE_FILE_NM , REAL_FILE_NM , DOC_DIV , DOC_NM , REG_DTTM FROM (SELECT B.LINK_NUM AS DOC_ID , B.IMG_NUM AS FILE_NUM , B.SAVE_PATH , B.SAVE_FILE_NM , B.REAL_FILE_NM
, A.CORP_CD AS DOC_DIV , A.CORP_NM AS DOC_NM , A.FRST_REG_DTTM AS REG_DTTM FROM TB_CORP A INNER JOIN TB_CM_IMG B ON A.CORP_ID = B.LINK_NUM
, SUBSTR(A.PRDT_NUM, 0, 2) AS DOC_DIV , A.PRDT_NM AS DOC_NM , A.FRST_REG_DTTM AS REG_DTTM
FROM TB_SP_PRDTINF A
FROM TB_SV_PRDTINF A
FROM TB_AD_PRDTINF A
FROM TB_RC_PRDTINF A
INNER JOIN TB_CM_IMG B ON A.PRDT_NUM = B.LINK_NUM
WHERE A.CORP_NM LIKE '%'||#docNm#||'%'
WHERE A.PRDT_NM LIKE '%'||#docNm#||'%'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REG_DTTM DESC
ORDER BY B.LINK_NUM DESC
, B.IMG_SN)) WHERE RN BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#firstIndex#) + 1 AND TO_NUMBER(#lastIndex#)

FROM TB_CORP A INNER JOIN TB_CM_IMG B ON A.CORP_ID = B.LINK_NUM
FROM TB_SP_PRDTINF A
FROM TB_SV_PRDTINF A
FROM TB_AD_PRDTINF A
FROM TB_RC_PRDTINF A
INNER JOIN TB_CM_IMG B ON A.PRDT_NUM = B.LINK_NUM
WHERE A.CORP_NM LIKE '%'||#docNm#||'%'
WHERE A.PRDT_NM LIKE '%'||#docNm#||'%'

SELECT IMG_NUM /*이미지 번호*/ , LINK_NUM /*연계 번호*/ , IMG_SN /*이미지 순번*/ , REAL_FILE_NM /*실제 파일 명*/ , (CASE WHEN LS_LINK_YN != 'Y' THEN SAVE_PATH ELSE API_IMG_THUMB END) AS SAVE_PATH , (CASE WHEN LS_LINK_YN != 'Y' THEN SAVE_FILE_NM ELSE NULL END) AS SAVE_FILE_NM FROM TB_SP_PRDTINF SP LEFT JOIN TB_CM_IMG CI ON CI.LINK_NUM = SP.PRDT_NUM INNER JOIN TB_CORP TC ON SP.CORP_ID = TC.CORP_ID WHERE PRDT_NUM = #linkNum# ORDER BY IMG_SN
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CM_IMG ( IMG_NUM /*이미지 번호*/ , LINK_NUM /*연계 번호*/ , IMG_SN /*이미지 순번*/ , SAVE_PATH /*저장 경로*/ , REAL_FILE_NM /*실제 파일 명*/ , SAVE_FILE_NM /*저장 파일 명*/ ) VALUES ( #imgNum# , #linkNum# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(IMG_SN),0) + 1 FROM TB_CM_IMG WHERE LINK_NUM = #linkNum# ) , #savePath# , #realFileNm# , #saveFileNm# )
